document_data.caption: A map showing Shattercrock Alley and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Shattercrock Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Shattrcrock Alley''' was a small alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Shattercrock Alley was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The alley branched south off of [[Stabbed Sailor Alley]], reconnecting with the alley after encircling [[Margaster Villa]].
document_data.History: The alley was named appropriately when a [[wizard]], one [[Phantamos|Phantamos of the Purple Cloak]], was learning to fly and crashed wildly through a cart of crockery.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* Margaster Villa
* [[The Wizard with Wings]] tavern
